Docs.summary: Provides a read-only container for a collection of objects.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This collection inherits from <xref:System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase>. The only way to add <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> objects to this collection is to use the class constructor.
This collection provides two indexer properties, a string indexer and an integer indexer. The string indexer property returns a component in the collection by name if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A> property of a component in the collection is not `null` and the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite.Name%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A> property of the component matches the specified string. The integer indexer property returns the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> at the specified collection index. The <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComponentCollection.CopyTo%2A> method copies the contents of the collection to a specified array, beginning writing to the array at the specified index.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method can be overridden by a derived class.
This property returns an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> in the collection if its <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A> property is not `null` and the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A> property matches the specified string.
> [!NOTE] > This string indexer works only when the component is sited, which typically occurs only at design time. To site a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> at run time, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Site%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>. The <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite.Name%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> set to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A> property must also be set for this property to return the component.
